::Ravage::

     A small ship landed in the center of the woods.
it opened up and out popped Ravage, the old Decepticon
warrior which was now part of the Alliance. he walked
around and scanned the area. unluckily the scanners
were broken so he picked up nothing. This is the 
ravage that was on beastwars a while back.
